about_the_game:
The settlement is located on a small island in the middle of a river, within the walls of an ancient structure. On each side of the island, a bridge leads to the shore, connecting the two sides of the river. There are not many of the ruins left, a few walls, and a stone tower at one of the bridgeheads. In front of the bridge, a wandering merchant struck a homestead with a varied portico. On the outskirts of the village, there is a tavern with a unique garden area.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
